citeinfo.origin: University of Alaska Fairbanks (UAF), School of Fisheries and Ocean Sciences (SFOS), Institute of Marine Science (IMS)
citeinfo.title: SEBSCC In Situ Nitrate Data

descript.abstract: Nitrate data were collected at SEBSCC mooring site 2 in collaboration with physical and biological investigators.
descript.purpose: The purpose of the in situ nitrate data collection was to assess the dynamics of nitrate enrichment processes at the 70m isobath of the SE Bering Sea shelf. This will provide a relatively long term period of high density measurements that can be compared to physical and biological measurements being collected concurrently.

idinfo.accconst: All data available one year after collection.
idinfo.useconst: No use constraints after one year of collection other than giving proper citation to the data origin.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
